alert.note: Alert for Cimarron (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 25 at 8:19PM CST until January 26 at 5:00PM CST by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snowfall accumulations of 1 to 3 inches are anticipated, with locally higher amounts around 4 inches possible across parts of the southern and southwest Texas Panhandle. * WHERE...The western Oklahoma Panhandle and all of the Texas Panhandle except Lipscomb County. * WHEN...Until 5 PM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday morning commute. Plan for longer commute times.
info.instruction: Be prepared for slippery and snow packed roads. Slow down and use caution while traveling. In Oklahoma, call 844-465-4997 for road information. In Texas, call 800-452-9292 for road information.
